name: ScissorsBreak
description:
You are Prisoner called Jimmy who is arrested for being jerk but wait....

The Jerck jimmy could smuggle two items to the prison a paper and scissors.. 

How? don't ask!

Now you have to help my friend Jimmy getting out with these tools cause his brain is little bit small :)

Bounce challenge: Try to escape him with two different ways.

If asking about the Rock, don't worry you'll know in the Game!
